content.1: And the rulers of the people dwelt at Jerusalem: the rest of the people also cast lots, to bring one of ten to dwell in Jerusalem the holy city, and nine parts
content.2: And the people blessed all the men, that willingly offered themselves to dwell at Jerusalem.
content.5: And Maaseiah the son of Baruch, the son of Col-hozeh, the son of Hazaiah, the son of Adaiah, the son of Joiarib, the son of Zechariah, the son of Shiloni.
content.6: All the sons of Perez that dwelt at Jerusalem
content.8: And after him Gabbai, Sallai, nine hundred twenty and eight.
content.9: And Joel the son of Zichri
content.10: Of the priests: Jedaiah the son of Joiarib, Jachin.
content.11: Seraiah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub,
content.12: And their brethren that did the work of the house
content.13: And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
content.14: And their brethren, mighty men of valour, an hundred twenty and eight: and their overseer
content.15: Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
content.16: And Shabbethai and Jozabad, of the chief of the Levites,
content.17: And Mattaniah the son of Micha, the son of Zabdi, the son of Asaph,
content.18: All the Levites in the holy city
content.19: Moreover the porters, Akkub, Talmon, and their brethren that kept the gates,
content.20: And the residue of Israel, of the priests,
content.21: But the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel: and Ziha and Gispa
content.22: The overseer also of the Levites at Jerusalem
content.24: And Pethahiah the son of Meshezabeel, of the children of Zerah the son of Judah,
content.25: And for the villages, with their fields,
content.26: And at Jeshua, and at Moladah, and at Beth-phelet,
content.27: And at Hazar-shual, and at Beer-sheba, and
content.28: And at Ziklag, and at Mekonah, and in the villages thereof,
content.29: And at En-rimmon, and at Zareah, and at Jarmuth,
content.31: The children also of Benjamin from Geba
content.35: Lod, and Ono, the valley of craftsmen.
